resources.string: Fetch schools from database and any change in the database will reflect automatically in the list.\neach school item has unique id generated by firebase, name and address.\nyou can add, update or delete school

Fetch schools from database and any change in the database will reflect automatically in the list.\neach school item has unique id generated by firebase, name and address.\nyou can add, update or delete school
Cloud storage allow us to upload and download files in remote cloud server.\nyou can upload any image from your device to the cloud storage\nyou can retrieve all images that exists in the storage
You will receive a notification from this app sending from firebase every day at 12 pm. this notification may be late for few minuets

Fetch app version form firebase remote config on clicking in the button below.\nWhen listen button below clicked any update in app version parameter in remote config will be automatically reflect in the text down
